feature_model.name: Match engine

meta.data: A LPS basead on a generic match engine

feature_model.feature_tree: :r Match engine(_r) :m Search(_r_1) :g (_r_1_7) [1,1] : Simple match(_r_1_7_8) :g (_r_1_9) [1,*] : Multiple match(_r_1_9_10) :m Crud(_r_2) :m Publish(_r_3) :o Comment(_r_4) :o Rate(_r_5) :o Spread(_r_6) :o Chat(_r_11)
